ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($Profile.Name != "Data Loader Profile", RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Indirect_Record_Type', ISPICKVAL(End_Customer_Information__c,"Currently Unknown End Customer"), OR(NOT(ISBLANK(G5_Contract_Approval_Date__c)), ISPICKVAL(Phase_Status__c, 'Submitted for G5 Approval') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: After requesting G5 approval End Customer Information field should be "Known End Customer" or "Multiple End Customer".
